Sentencas: Homogeneous, bubble-free and smooth gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) films were successfully obtained with the application of alternating current electrophoretic deposition (AC-EPD) in the aqueous suspension.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria

Sentencas: GDC particles were well dispersed in the aqueous suspension at a pH of 9.0.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria

Sentencas: The alternating current was achieved through the application of an asymmetric square wave voltage to the electrodes of the deposition cell.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria

Sentencas: An optimum frequency of 1 kHz showed the best balance between the suppression of bubble evolution and enhancement of the particle migration.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria

Sentencas: The deposit yield increased monotonically with increasing time under the AC-EPD with a frequency of 1 kHz, suggesting its great potential to fabricate tunable thicknesses of deposition layers.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria

Sentencas: The quality of the GDC film improved with an increase in frequency.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria

Sentencas: An optimum combination of forward and reverse voltages and half-widths of the pulses was found.
Titulo: Aqueous electrophoretic deposition of gadolinium doped ceria
